sequence:
My Sister's Growth Spurt?!

<size=45>Chapter 7: My Sister's Smile</size>

scripts.say: With the combined advice from her sisters, Vincennes had a better understanding of her secretary duties.
Commander, can you check if I sorted these documents correctly?
And here is today's agenda... Ah, I wrote the wrong thing here...
Although she was still a bit clumsy, her progress was undeniable.
I couldn't help but to feel a little proud of how much she had grown in such a short time.
Oh right, Commander, these are for you...
Vincennes handed over a small pouch of elegantly-wrapped cookies.
They were clearly handmade. Their shapes were a bit rough, but one could immediately see the sincere feelings of the person who made them.
Um... Astoria said you liked cookies, so we made these together...
Commander, I wanted to thank you for always looking after me...
I also made some for my sisters... I'm not sure why, but Quincy started to cry on the spot...
Ah... I definitely could see that happening...
Even though it's nice to be pampered, and to be able to go to sleep whenever I want...
It's even nicer to be able to work hard alongside you and my sisters.
So, from now on, I'll do my best!
Okay! Oh, but um... Commander, you'll still take naps with me, right?
